title:
"Don’t cheat the world of your contribution. Give it what you’ve got. " Steven Pressfield
You probably...

attachments.displayName:
"Don’t cheat the world of your contribution. Give it what you’ve got. " Steven Pressfield
You probably heard me said this before, but I am going to say it anyway. The BEST contribution you can ever make is by the way you live your life EVERY DAY.
At every moment of your day to day life, you are presented with infinite opportunities to give birth to a new ENERGY in the form of who YOU are! That's your UNIQUE contribution.

It is easy to BE kind to the people we love. But the real growth is HOW you treat others. How you have compassion for others. How you forgive others. That is the greatest and most powerful impact you can have to the Collective Consciousness.

You want to UPGRADE your business and your life? You need to EMBODY this TRUTH! You don't do it, you don't get to enter into that Paradigm. You don't enter into that Paradigm, you DON'T get all the rewards that comes with it! That's the Law.

Unleash your potential,
Darsana (DarsanaRoldan.com)

object.content:
"Don’t cheat the world of your contribution. Give it what you’ve got. " Steven Pressfield 
You probably heard me said this before, but I am going to say it anyway. The BEST contribution you can ever make is by the way you live your life EVERY DAY. 
At every moment of your day to day life, you are presented with infinite opportunities to give birth to a new ENERGY in the form of who YOU are! That's your UNIQUE contribution. 
 
It is easy to BE kind to the people we love. But the real growth is HOW you treat others. How you have compassion for others. How you forgive others. That is the greatest and most powerful impact you can have to the Collective Consciousness. 

You want to UPGRADE your business and your life? You need to EMBODY this TRUTH! You don't do it, you don't get to enter into that Paradigm. You don't enter into that Paradigm, you DON'T get all the rewards that comes with it! That's the Law. 

Unleash your potential,
Darsana (DarsanaRoldan.com)
